description:
Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

With the Pinchos app, you manage the entire restaurant experience right from your phone. Book a table, order food and drinks – and easily pay the bill at the end of your visit. Maybe you'd also like to challenge your company in a quiz? Last but not least – join our guest club The Society and start collecting rewards! Welcome to Pinchos.

Velkommen til Sunset Boulevard app’en!


Her kan du springe køen over i vores restauranter.


Vi har nemlig gjort det nemt og hurtigt for dig at bestille og betale for mad direkte i appen på
din iPhone eller iPad.


Du kan vælge mellem at spise i restauranten eller bestille take-away. Flere af vores restauranter
tilbyder også SunsetToGo, så du kan få maden leveret direkte til din bil.


I vores app finder du altid:

- Gode fordele og priser
- Aktuelle kampagner
- Information om allergener
- Den nærmeste restaurant
- Åbningstider
- … og meget mere


I vores app kan du også tilmelde dig SunsetPOINT, hvor du kan:
- Optjene point hver gang du bestiller
- Indløse dine opsparede point og rabatter, allerede næste gang du bestiller – der er
ingen krav om minimum opsparede point før indløsning
- Opspare helt op til 10.000 point
- Se hvor mange point du har, og hvilken rabat du kan indløse næste gang
- Bestille og betale direkte via appen – så har vi dit måltid klar til det valgte tidspunkt


Du kan også tilmelde dig SunsetPLUS, hvor du kan:
- Spare op til 50% på hele vores menukort, som består af et bredt udvalg af burgere,
sandwiches og desserter.

Du kan via vores app betale med: Visa Dankort, MasterCard, Maestro, Visa Electron, ApplePay
og MobilePay.


Download app'en allerede i dag og nyd alle de mange spændende fordele!


Du kan nemt skifte mellem sprogene, engelsk og dansk, i vores app.

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Eksklusive tilbud: Burger King-tilbud har aldrig smagt bedre. Få adgang til
kampagner og tilbud, der kun findes i appen. Hold notifikationerne tændt, så du
aldrig går glip af noget!
 
Kuponer: Få øjeblikkelige besparelser med dine mobilkuponer. Vi opdaterer dem
ofte, så du altid får de nyeste og lækreste deals – ligesom vores ingredienser.
 
Forudbestil: Har du lyst til flammegrillet lækkerier? Spring køen over, og forudbestil
for en hurtig og bekvem afhentning. Din mad, din helt egne måde – klar til dig!
 
Bordservering: Med vores bordservering kan du læne dig tilbage, slappe af og lade
os servere dit måltid direkte til dit bord, så du kan nyde det i ro og mag.

Find din BK®: Find din nærmeste Burger King®-restaurant, og lad aldrig din lyst til
flammegrillet gå uopfyldt.
 
Menu: Udforsk dine BK®-favoritter, og opdag de nyeste tilføjelser til vores menu. Du
kan også altid finde beskrivelser og næringsoplysninger.
 
Download Burger King-appen i dag, og få det bedste ud af hver bid – lige ved
hånden!

app_name: Too Good To Go: End Food Waste
description:
Too Good To Go is your smart way to enjoy tasty food at great value, while doing good for the planet. Winner of the 2023 ‘Cultural Impact’ category at the prestigious Apple App Store Awards, the #1 app to reduce food waste helps you save delicious, unsold snacks, meals, and ingredients from local shops, cafés, supermarkets, restaurants, and top brands—all at great prices. 

In a world where 40% of food produced goes to waste each year, reducing food waste is the #1 action we can take to help tackle climate change. With Too Good To Go, you can unlock affordable meals and grocery items while helping to save the planet. Together, we have the power to make a real difference.



HOW TOO GOOD TO GO WORKS:

EXPLORE AND DISCOVER
Download the app to explore a map showing nearby restaurants, cafés, bakeries, supermarkets or trusted brands offering good food at a great price, ready to be rescued.

SAVE YOUR SURPRISE BAG OR TOO GOOD TO GO PARCEL
Browse a variety of Surprise Bags filled with tasty, unsold food—whether it’s sushi, pizza, burgers, or fresh fruits and veggies. Prefer to get your favourite food brands delivered to you? Save a Too Good To Go Parcel packed with good food from the brands you love, at great prices. 

AFFORDABLE EATS
Save a Surprise Bag or a Too Good To Go Parcel at ½ price or less. 

RESERVE YOUR SAVE
Confirm your purchase through the app to reserve your Surprise Bag and rescue these delicious meals from going to waste. By rescuing food, you save money and help fight food waste.

ENJOY
Collect your Surprise Bag at the scheduled time, or have your Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.


WHY TOO GOOD TO GO?:

WALLET-FRIENDLY INDULGENCE
Enjoy quality meals at affordable prices, satisfying both your taste buds and your wallet.

VARIETY AND CHOICE
Too Good To Go partners with a wide selection of local favourites and top brands, offering everything from sushi, pizza, baked and fresh goods to easy-to-store staple grocery items such as snacks, drinks, sweets or pasta.

ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT
Each meal saved avoids CO2e emissions and the unnecessary use of water and land resources. By rescuing food from going to waste, you take a step towards a greener, cleaner planet. 

EASY PURCHASE PROCESS
The app’s simple and user-friendly interface makes it easy to browse, choose, and save Surprise Bags or Too Good To Go Parcels.

CONVENIENCE
Pick up your Surprise Bag at the designated time, or have a Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.

JOIN THE TOO GOOD TO GO COMMUNITY
Join the community of food lovers making a positive impact on the environment. Download the app now and start reducing food waste, bite by bite. 
Reducing food waste is a key action to help tackle climate change. For more information, visit tgtg.to/claims

Med JustEat-appen kan du bestille lige det, du mangler, lige meget hvor du er. Med et stort udvalg af restauranter, supermarkeder og dagligvarebutikker at vælge imellem kan du bestille alt lige fra burgere, pizza, pasta, sushi, salater og alt muligt andet og få det hele leveret hjemme hos dig.
 
 Har du brug for nogle ting fra supermarkedet? Åbn blot JustEat-appen, vælg ’dagligvarer’, og fyld din kurv. Vores partnere kan hjælpe med det hele, uanset om du mangler babymad, blomster, øl, vin, skønhedsprodukter, is, chokolade, mælk, frugt eller brød.

 Sådan fungerer det:
 Det er nemt at bestille. Du kan enten vælge en gemt adresse, angive dit postnummer/gadenavn eller lade appen finde din placering automatisk. Derefter finder du din yndlingsrestaurant eller -butik og vælger det, du skal bruge.  

 Følg din bestilling hele vejen hjem til dig:
 Følg din bestilling på sin vej fra restauranten eller butikken og hjem til dig med vores Food Tracker®. Vi sender dig også push-beskeder, som giver en status på din bestilling. Det tager som regel 30-45 minutter at levere din mad eller dine dagligvarer. 

 Det får du med vores app:
 - Hurtig og nem bestilling
 - Gode tilbud og rabatter
 - Du kan vælge at hente din bestilling i restauranten eller butikken
 - Genbestil det samme lækre måltid med et enkelt tryk på en knap
 - Søg på dagligvarebutikker, retter og madtyper, tilbud, bedst anmeldte restauranter, steder nær dig samt vegetarisk/halal
 - Modtag regelmæssige opdateringer på din bestilling med vores Food Tracker®
 - Vælg mellem flere betalingsmuligheder
 
 Bestil fra store brands eller små lokale. 
 JustEat har det hele!

Sushi Score: The Ultimate Sushi Counter!

Are you a sushi fanatic? Do you dominate the all-you-can-eat sushi scene? Then Sushi Score is the app you NEED! Forget mental math and embarrassing finger counting – now you can effortlessly track your sushi conquests with a simple tap!

How it works:
- Tap to tally: Just tap the adorable sushi face every time you devour a delicious roll. It's that easy sushi counting!
- High score hero: Sushi Score automatically tracks your highest sushi-eating achievement. Can you beat your personal best? 
- Bragging Rights: Share your epic sushi scores with friends and challenge them to a sushi showdown! Show them your sushi count!

Let's be honest, our happy sushi is appealing. Who wants to tap a boring button when you can tap a cute piece of sushi whilst sushi counting? We've designed Sushi Score to be incredibly user-friendly. No complicated menus or confusing features – just pure sushi-counting bliss. Track your progress and see how your sushi skills evolve over time.

Brechts Steakhaus - Your Premium Steakhouse Experience

Discover the ultimate dining companion for Brechts Steakhaus. Browse our curated menu of premium steaks, appetizers, sides, and desserts. Make table reservations with ease, place orders directly from your phone, and track your dining history.

Features:
- Explore our full menu with detailed descriptions and prices
- Reserve tables for any occasion
- Place orders for dine-in or takeout
- Earn loyalty rewards with every visit
- View your order and reservation history
- Get restaurant information and contact details

Whether you're craving a perfectly grilled ribeye, filet mignon, or our signature tomahawk steak, Brechts Steakhaus app makes your dining experience seamless and enjoyable. Join our loyalty program and start earning rewards today.

Perfect for steak lovers, fine dining enthusiasts, and anyone seeking a premium restaurant experience.

Få madplaner og opskrifter med ugens tilbud.

Med Mambeno kan du nemt bygge den billigste madplan ud fra lige den type mad, du har lyst til og spare masser af penge på husholdningsbudgettet.

Du kan også vælge mellem vores faste ugentlige madplaner, Mambenos klassiske familiemadplan eller madplanen med "Mere grønt - mindre kød".

Og du kan endda få leveret alt til ugens måltider til døren sammen med dine øvrige dagligvarer fra din lokale REMA 1000. 

Der er intet minimumskøb, du kan tilføje alle dine øvrige dagligvarer til din bestilling, og samtidig støtter du din lokale købmand.

Og med Danmarks første interaktive madpakke-bygger, kan du nu også bygge ungernes madpakker og få alt leveret til døren.

Du får en nemmere hverdag og sparer tid på både madlavning og indkøb. Du får bl.a.: 

1. En fiks og færdig madplan med nemme opskrifter direkte i appen hver torsdag

2. Smart indkøbsliste - køb selv ind eller få alt leveret lige til døren i hele Danmark**

3. Lækre opskrifter på både aftensmad og madpakker

4. Opskrifter særligt tilpasset børnefamilier. Med grønt, fisk og fuldkorn

5. Færre impulskøb så du sparer penge på indkøbene

6. Mindre madspild

Med Mambenos app kan du planlægge ugens måltider fra sofaen. 

Du kan f.eks. udskifte retter med et enkelt klik. Bliver I flere eller færre til aftensmad, kan du justere i personantallet på den enkelte opskrift, ligesom du kan tilføje dine personlige noter til både opskrifter og ugedage. Så kan du f.eks. notere, hvis mor eller far kommer sent hjem, eller ungerne skal ha' en turmadpakke med i børnehave eller skole.

Du kan overføre en hel madplan, eller bare en enkelt opskrift, til den smarte indkøbsliste og tilføje alt det andet, du mangler til den øvrige husholdning. Så kan du helt selv vælge, om du vil tage appen med i supermarkedet eller ha' alt leveret til døren fra REMA 1000 med Vigo.

Du kan også bruge den smarte "Tøm køleskabet"-funktion, hvor du får forslag til opskrifter ud fra de råvarer, du har i dit køleskab.

Du kan prøve alle funktionerne helt gratis i 30 dage. Ønsker du at fortsætte, kan du vælge mellem tre løbende medlemsskaber, der automatisk fornyes:

Månedsabonnement: Betal pr. måned
Kvartalsabonnement: Betal pr. kvartal
Årsabonnement: Betal pr. år

Du tegner et abonnement på Mambeno. De første 30 dage er gratis og uden binding. Du kan omkostningsfrit opsige dit abonnement i prøveperioden. Abonnementet fornyes automatisk, medmindre autofornyelse er slået fra, mindst 24 timer inden udgangen af den aktuelle betalingsperiode. 

Du kan gå til dine iTunes-kontoindstillinger for at administrere dit abonnement og slå automatisk fornyelse fra. Betaling vil blive opkrævet på din iTunes-konto når købet er bekræftet. 

Din konto vil blive opkrævet for fornyelse inden for 24 timer inden udgangen af den aktuelle betalingsperiode. Gavekort eller rabatkoder kan ikke benyttes ved iTunes-betaling.

Vi håber, at du bliver glad for Mambeno - og får en lidt nemmere hverdag.

Vilkår, betingelser og privatlivspolitik: https://mambeno.dk/vilkaar-betingelser-app-ios/

* Prisen er beregnet ud fra aftensmad til to voksne og to børn man-fre ved billigste indkøbsmulighed i et lavprissupermarked. 

Prisen på de 500,- beregnes altid ud fra indkøbsprisen i REMA 1000 den torsdag, den pågældnede madplan udkommer. Prisen kan herefter ændre sig både op og ned alt efter prisjusteringer og tilbud i REMA 1000. 

Prisen forudsætter enkelte basisvarer som mel, sukker, smør etc. Dog kan ugen omkring jul, nytår og påske være dyrere pga. særlige råvarer som f.eks. and og lam.

** Undtaget de steder, hvor REMA 1000 ikke leverer.

Welcome to the Ole & Steen app - created for lovers of Danish pastries, fresh coffee and decadent cakes. Collect points and earn custom rewards for every purchase you make, easily pay in store and online with your app, and get access to special perks. 

Earn Points & Rewards
•	Receive a free Cinnamon Social Slice when you download the app
•	Collect points with every purchase and redeem for free coffee, freshly baked breads, cakes, pastries and more
•	Get early access to our seasonal menus and new merchandise

Pay in Store
•	Link your debit/credit cards or ApplePay to your profile to easily pay at any of our stores
•	Collect bonus points when you pay with your app in stores

Click & Collect
•	Skip the line with Click & Collect ordering
•	Select and pay for your items directly in the app, choose your pick-up date and time, and we will have order packed and ready for your arrival

Download the Ole & Steen app and follow the scent of great coffee and baked goods.

We look forward to seeing you. Velkommen!

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Med din 7-Eleven app lige ved hånden bliver du forkælet lidt ekstra. Du får nemlig rabat på en masse lækkerier på farten, og hver 7. kop kaffe, sandwich og sprøde croissant er på butikkens regning. Du kan også glæde dig til både sunde og sjove overraskelser. Så hold øje, og gå ikke glip af alle dine fordele. 

 

TILBUD: 

Her finder du nye app-tilbud hver uge på bl.a. smagfuld mad, læskende drikke og duftende produkter fra bageriet.Tjek din app løbende og indløs din kode i butikken, når f.eks. dit yndlingsprodukt er på tilbud. 

Er du studerende kan du også benytte dig af vores studietilbud i app’en. 

 

VÆRDIKORT: 

Spar penge med vores værdikort til 5 kopper valgfri skænk-selv-drikke. Du skal blot forudbetale 100,- i din 7-Eleven-butik og herefter kan du indløse de 5 kopper med dit digitale værdikort. Kortet kan naturligvis tankes op igen, når dine 5 kopper er indløst. 

 

LOYALITETSKORT: 

De fleste kan ikke få nok af vores sprøde, friskbagte croissanter. Med vores loyalitetskort kan du samle stempler og få den 7. croissant gratis. 

Du kan også samle stempler på bl.a. kaffe og frisksmurt sandwich og få den 7. kaffe eller sandwich gratis. 

Når du har samlet alle 6 stempler, modtager du en kupon til dit 7. gratis produkt, som du blot indløser, når du besøger din 7-Eleven. 
 

SPIL: 

Vi forkæler løbende vores brugere med spil i app’en. Hold øje med nye spil og få muligheden for at vinde lækre præmier! 

 

DEL MED EN VEN: 

Deler du vores app med en ven, får I begge en gratis varm drik. Send invitationen til den ven, du ønsker at byde på en evt. kop kaffe. 

Så snart din invitation accepteres, får I begge en værdikupon til en gratis varm drik. 

 

FIND EN BUTIK: 

Se vores butiksoversigt, åbningstider og find vej til den 7-Eleven du ønsker at besøge. 

 

Vi ses i app’en!

With 65 million users, Vivino is the world’s largest wine app and marketplace empowering people everywhere to enjoy wine to the fullest. Vivino provides wine drinkers access to unbiased information about wine from a community of millions. 

HOW IT WORKS
• Take a photo of any wine label or restaurant wine list or search by wine 
• Instantly see a wine’s rating, reviews, price, tasting notes, and suggested food pairings 
• Get your favorite bottles delivered to your door
• Add your ratings and reviews 
• Easily keep track of wines you like and discover new recommendations 
• Save the bottles you buy in your cellar, so you always know what you have on hand 
• Buy the right wine every time! 

VIVINO PREMIUM
Level up your wine game with...
• Our full scanning suite, including rapid-fire scanning so you can compare countless bottles within seconds
• Exact “match for you” scores for every single wine
• By-the-bottle insights into whether you usually like, loathe, or have never explored a wine style, grape, region
• Wine adventures to taste and play your way through Italy, Bordeaux, and beyond

STATS AT A GLANCE 
• 65 million app downloads and climbing 
• 16 million wines and counting from 245,000+ wineries 
• Millions of unbiased ratings and reviews 
• Hundreds of thousands of wines available for purchase in 18 markets worldwide  

KEY FEATURES
• Unbiased Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world’s largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine. 
• Wine Buying Made Easy: Conveniently buy wine directly from the Vivino app. 
• Personalized Recommendations: Discover more wines you will love through Vivino’s wine recommendation engine that only suggests wines we know you will love based on your unique scanning, rating, and purchase behaviour, and community ratings. 
• Quick Compare: Pick the best wine on the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels in seconds to instantly view ratings, region, price, and food pairings all on one page. 
• Wine List Scanner: Select the right wine every time from any restaurant’s entire wine list. 
• Taste Characteristics: Know what the wine you’re eyeing tastes like before buying it. Taste Characteristics aggregates the most commonly used words to describe wines.
• Taste Profile: Track and organize your wines to determine your taste profile, discover new wines, and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.

Privacy policy: https://www.vivino.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.vivino.com/terms

Please note that we are not able to reply to comments or questions left in App Store reviews. If you have any support-related inquiries or need assistance, please contact support@vivino.com

Optjen point, få lækre Deals og bestil nemt i den nye Carl's Jr. app.

- Optjen point: Scan dit medlems-ID og saml point, som du kan bruge på lækre burgere, sides, friske drikkevarer og lækre desserter.
- Få eksklusive Deals: Få adgang til unikke deals og rabatter, kun for app-brugere.
- Bestil på farten: Spring køen over og bestil din mad direkte fra appen. Vælg mellem take away eller spis i restauranten.

Download appen i dag og oplev en ny måde at nyde Carl’s Jr. på!

HelloFresh is a food recipe Box delivery service, developed to be your weekly meal planner.

HelloFresh lets you choose from a wide range of recipes to create the perfect menu that delivers just the right amount of ingredients you need for cooking deliciously easy meals from scratch. You can say goodbye to the need to create your own weekly meal planner, spend less time queuing at the supermarket and relying on food delivery apps, and start cooking tasty, fresh and easy meals from the comfort of your kitchen.

Cooking tasty, wholesome meals has never been easier. Every week, HelloFresh delivers a recipe Box full of your chosen menu of recipes and fresh, quality ingredients. Use our meal planner app to pick your weekly menu of easy meals and explore a wide range of tasty food recipes. You can look forward to cooking a variety of dishes, including Calorie Smart meals under 650 calories, Rapid recipes ready in 20 minutes and tasty vegetarian options. With the HelloFresh recipe Box, there's something to suit plenty of lifestyles and tastes.


How does HelloFresh work?

1. Our weekly meal planner app helps you create the perfect menu and easily cook tasty recipes from scratch. From Veggie recipes to quick meals, globally inspired flavours and more, there's so much to choose. Simply select your recipes based on your household size and food preference. Plus, you can round out your Box with a delicious selection of food from our expanded menu, including sides, desserts, breakfast and more.
2. Meal prep and meal planning delivered: Enjoy step-by-step recipe cards and the fresh ingredients you need to get cooking, with your Box delivered straight to your door. Plus, you can take back your evenings with fewer trips to the supermarket, pre-planned meals, and little clean up.
3. Delicious and wholesome dinners: You can enjoy cooking up tasty food that everyone at the kitchen table will love. A menu tailored to your taste, every week!

Other reasons to love the HelloFresh food recipe Box:

With HelloFresh, you can spend less time shopping for food in the supermarket, thanks to the handy weekly recipe Box deliveries. No more wondering about what you'll be cooking every week or spending time thinking about your meal planner - with easy, tasty and fresh recipes delivered. Instead, you can spend more time doing the things you love.

Bite into quality food: We prioritise sourcing local products so only fresh, seasonal ingredients make it on to the menu and into your recipe Box, ready for cooking up tasty food and meals that are packed full of flavour.

Waste less food: HelloFresh customers waste 21% less food than those buying from supermarkets, thanks to ingredients for recipes being measured in just the right amounts.

What will you find on the HelloFresh meal planner app?

100+ recipes per month that you can discover, add to your menu, rate and share tasty food with your friends and family.

Handy recipe timers and step-by-step guides to help with cooking your tasty meals.

A flexible online account where you can easily choose your recipes or change the subscription settings by 11:59 PM, five days prior to your delivery. Plus, it’s easy to skip a week or cancel if your food plans for the week change.

There’s no longer a need for a meal planner, with HelloFresh we will handle the meal prep, so you can enjoy cooking tasty recipes and eating delicious food!

What our customers are saying:

It's time to get cooking and enjoy fresh, tasty meals with the HelloFresh Recipe Box. Leave the meal planning to us!

Gluten Advisor helps you find verified gluten-free and celiac-safe restaurants, bakeries, pastry shops, pizzerias, cafés, hotels, bars, pubs, takeaways and shops around the world. Whether you’re travelling, dining out locally, or simply trying to live a gluten-free lifestyle, our app gives you the confidence to make informed food choices every day.

The app features a global map with over 7,000 vetted gluten-free locations, including trusted recommendations for celiac-friendly eateries, hotels, and stores. You can explore local favorites, bookmark your top spots, and even create custom collections by city to help you plan safe gluten-free trips.

Beyond dining and travel, Gluten Advisor also includes a rich collection of gluten-free recipes covering everything from fresh bread and soft buns to full meals and desserts. Recipes are available in both video and step-by-step written format, making them easy to follow for cooks of all levels.

In addition, the app offers a library of informative articles about living gluten-free, celiac-related health issues, ingredient safety, and frequently asked questions, such as whether oats are safe for celiacs. This educational content is curated to help users better understand gluten-related conditions and manage their diet with clarity and confidence.

Whether you have celiac disease, a gluten intolerance, or are choosing a gluten-free lifestyle for health and wellness, Gluten Advisor brings together trusted tools to support you in every situation. From planning your next trip to cooking at home, this app provides everything you need to live gluten-free with ease.

Download Gluten Advisor now and take control of your gluten-free journey, wherever life takes you.

Inspired by Sweden's cherished tradition of Fika, your first Fika is on us when you sign up in the app. Plus, as a Fika Club member, you can:

- Receive personalized offers: the offers are tailored just for you
- Collect Fika Points: you earn Fika Points when you shop, top-up, or complete Fika Fun challenges
- Redeem for rewards: you get to choose your rewards and enjoy your Fika moments just how you like them
- Preorder in the app: skip the queue and have more time for your Fika moments

Use the JOE & THE JUICE app to order your favorite juice, coffee, sandwich, or smoothie, for pick-up or delivery, and earn points on every purchase with the new Loyalty Program.

After your first app order you will get an item at no cost.* A healthy sandwich, smoothie, or salad bowl—you choose!

Still not convinced? Here are more good reasons why you are going to love the JOE & THE JUICE app:

PRE-ORDER:
- Skip the line and save time!
- Place an order in the app and it will be ready when you arrive, or choose an exact pick-up time.
- Customize food and drinks to your dietary preferences. Gluten free sandwich? Acai bowl without granola? Protein or collagen in your iced matcha? The app makes it possible.
- Track the progress of your order and receive a notification when it’s ready!

LOYALTY PROGRAM & REWARDS
Our new Loyalty Program gives you control into the way you get rewarded for your loyalty.
- Earn points with every purchase made in the app or in store using scan to pay excluding purchases made with JOE Cards, Reward Cards and Campaign cards.
- Exchange your points on your favorite juices, coffees and treats. 
- Complete fun in-app challenges to boost your points and unlock exclusive rewards.
- Level up through the Loyalty Program. The more you order, the higher your level!

Our Loyalty Program consists of 3 levels:
- GREY: Welcome Reward after your first purchase (excluding counter products, shots and water). Your journey begins here.
- YELLOW: Order 15 items per year and level up to Joe Member status. Earn +10% more points on every purchase.
- PINK: Order 50 items per year and unlock exclusive rewards you won’t find anywhere else. Earn +20% more points, plus even more treats, surprise campaigns and more.

DELIVERY
Need your brewed espresso, tropical smoothie, breakfast bundle, or sandwich delivered straight to your door? Say no more! Use Deliveroo, or order directly through the JOE app so you don’t miss out on any points.

WAIT, THERE’S MORE. USE THE APP TO:
- Find the nearest JOE & THE JUICE location.
- Scan for points when you order food and drinks at the counter.
- Reorder your favorite food and drinks with two taps. That best smoothie on the planet. Or sweet green salad.
- Receive special JOE coffee and juice offers before everyone else.
- View allergens, nutrition, and calories for each food and drink product. Gluten? Vegan? Specialty coffee order? The app has your back with whatever makes you feel good and healthy.

*To receive a complimentary item, the first app order cannot be water, shots, or counter products. Offer limited to one per credit card.

If you have any questions or feedback, you can contact customer service in the app.

For more juice, smoothie, coffee, and fast delivery, find us on Instagram @joeandthejuice or visit www.joejuice.com

Valdemarsro app er fyldt med lækre opskrifter og med et abonnement får du også adgang til madplaner, smart indkøbsliste, din egen favoritside, filtrering på allergener, dit eget private notefelt til opskrifterne og meget mere …
+ du kan selvfølgelig dele dit medlemskab med din husstand, så er I alle opdateret på både jeres madplan og indkøbsliste, som automatisk synkroniseres mellem jer. 

Valdemarsro app hjælper dig til at spare penge, spare tid, undgå madspild og til at spise godt og varieret. Vi har udviklet appen og medlemskabet af Valdemarsro, som et værktøj til dig – for at gøre det nemmere, sjovere, hurtigere og mere inspirerende at planlægge måltiderne og få købt ind.

Med abonnement på Valdemarsro Premium får du adgang til: 

•  Ugentlige madplan hvor du nemt kan udskifte, fjerne eller tilføje opskrifter og du kan justere madplanen til, så den bliver helt unik og passer perfekt til dit behov. Vælg frit hvilken af de 3 ugentlige madplaner du vil følge, blandt andet er der fx både en madplan til børnefamilier og en vegetarmadplan. Uanset hvilken madplan du vælger, så kan du nemt og hurtigt tilpasse den perfekt til dig og dine behov. 

•  Smart indkøbsseddel, som lægger ingredienserne sammen og sortere dem i kategori. Klik det væk du har i forvejen, for at få en overskuelig og nem indkøbsseddel, som hjælper til både at spare penge og undgå madspild.

•  Din egen personlige favoritside, hvor du kan gemme dine yndlingsopskrifter og opskrifter du gerne vil prøve. Du kan nemt filtrere i dine favorit opskrifter. 

•  Dit eget notefelt til opskrifterne

•  Energiberegning på alle opskrifter

•  Filtrering af opskrifter efter allergener, som fx gluten, laktose, nødder mv

•  Login både på Valdemarsro.dk og i appen

•  Du kan dele dit medlemskab med din husstand, så jeres madplan og indkøbsseddel automatisk opdateres mellem jer. 

Abonnement på Valdemarsro koster kun:
• 39.- pr måned
• 199.- pr år (det er under 17 kr. pr måned)
Abonnementet betales forud, og er uden binding.

Support
Du må altid skrive til os på mail@valdemarsro.dk hvis du har brug for support eller hjælp til appen og dit abonnement. 

Abonnements betingelser
Når du køber Valdemarsro Premium via App Store får du adgang til alle funktioner og tilmelder dig samtidig et enten et månedligt abonnement til 39 kr om måneden, som fornyes automatisk hver måned eller et årligt abonnement til 199 kr. om året, som fornyes automatisk hvert år.
Betalingen bliver trukket fra det betalingskort der er forbundet til din iTunes konto og beløbet trækkes efter du har bekræftet købet. Abonnementet fornyes automatisk og fortsætter til du opsiger det. Ønsker du at stoppe abonnementet, skal det gøres under dine kontoindstillinger i iTunes eller i App Store, hvor du skal slå autofornyelse fra. Dette skal ske senest 24 timer før den automatiske fornyelse af abonnementet. Beløbet for den næste periode trækkes på den sidste dag af den nuværende periode. Efter opsigelse af abonnementet, har du stadig adgang til alle funktioner i den periode, du har betalt for.
Du kan læse mere om vores servicevilkår og privatlivspolitik her:
Servicevilkår: https://www.valdemarsro.dk/servicevilkaar/
Privatlivspolitik: https://www.valdemarsro.dk/personoplysninger-og-cookie-politik/

Gourministeriet – madinspiration i lommen

Få adgang til over 1.900 opskrifter i app og på gourministeriet.dk – altid gennemtestede, enkle og fulde af smag. Opskrifterne spænder fra nem hverdagsmad til gæstemenuer og sæsonfavoritter.

Som Premium kan du gemme dine favoritter, nyde en helt annoncefri oplevelse, se kalorier & energifordeling (opdateres løbende) og få endnu flere smarte funktioner, der gør din madlavning lettere.

Ud over opskrifter finder du også restaurant-anmeldelser og rejseinspiration med fokus på madoplevelser i Danmark og resten af verden.
Gourministeriet blev startet i 2019 af Dianna Brinch, og er i dag et af Danmarks største maduniverser med over 285.000 følgere på Instagram.

Appen er udviklet til at være enkel, overskuelig og inspirerende – så opskrifterne altid er i centrum.

For brugsbetingelser, se Apples standard EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

//The most downloaded wine cellar management app in 2025!
Oeni helps you manage your wine cellar/collection and recommend the best wine at the best time (peak). Whether you're a seasoned collector or a casual wine lover, Oeni offers comprehensive tools to easily manage your wine inventory.

//Master your inventory at your fingertips
Oeni tracks the history of your cellar, its stock, and aging with precision and simplicity.

- Discover our immersive 3D wine cellar feature to easily visualize and organize your bottles, as if you were there!
- Scan and add your bottles quickly: With a directory of more than 400,000 bottles, including majestic wines, adding your wines to the Oeni cellar only takes a few seconds. Our application has similar performance to other well-known wine apps such as Vivino, VinoCell, Invintory, wine-searcher or CellarTracker.
- Specify their vintage: By adding the vintage of your bottles, Oeni will be able to recommend the ideal time to open them.
- Enter their purchase price: The purchase price of your bottles is a crucial element for tracking your expenses and investments over time.
- Monitor your stock: Oeni allows you to know your stock accurately and will help you manage it over time. Your cellar will no longer have any secrets for you.
- Analyze their aging: Follow the aging phases of each of your bottles to know their maturity level and peak date.
- Enjoy with the right dish: Oeni recommends food and wine pairings with over 5,000 dishes so you don't miss any tasting.
- Analyze Aging: Follow the aging phases of your wines to determine their maturity and peak dates. Oeni’s vino wine scanner feature helps you understand the aging process better.

//Track the financial value of your cellar
Oeni analyzes the price of each bottle and follows its evolution over time.

- Measure your expenses: Analyze your expenses month by month, year by year, to understand and adapt your budget.
- Know the value of your cellar: Every month, Oeni retrieves the market price of your bottles to continuously update the value of your cellar.
- Track your capital gains: Oeni informs you of your real-time capital gains and bottle by bottle, so you don't miss anything.
- Expense Analysis: Monitor your expenses month by month and year by year to better understand and manage your budget.
- Value Tracking: Oeni updates the market price of your bottles monthly, providing an accurate valuation of your cellar. Our wine reviews cellar feature keeps you informed about the current market trends.
- Capital Gains Monitoring: Stay informed about your real-time capital gains on each bottle to optimize your collection.

//A personal and intelligent sommelier
Oeni manages your wine cellar and recommends the right wine at the right time.

- Food and Wine Pairings: Choose from over 5,400 food and wine pairings to find the perfect pairing for any meal. Oeni will make recommendations as relevant, or even more relevant, than other apps like Vivino, cellartracker or Wine Scanner to provide you with the best recommendations.
- Refine your search by specifying the occasion: "an everyday wine," "a nice dinner with friends," or "for special occasions."
- Oeni will then analyze your wine cellar to find the perfect match based on food and wine pairings, the aging phases of your bottles, and their market value.
- Oeni offers its selection of bottles with a recommendation percentage for each of them. All you have to do is choose.

Additional Features :
- Extensive Wine Database: Access a database of over 400,000 bottles and 2,400 appellations.
- Detailed Wine Information: Get complete details on each bottle, including wine reviews and ratings
- Best cellar management tool for wine collection

More information on the terms of use and the privacy policy
- Privacy policy: https://oeni.app/en/politique-de-confidentialite/
- Terms of use: https://oeni.app/en/conditions-generales-dutilisation/
